column1: John was born in 1985 and lives in New York.
The Eiffel Tower is located in Paris.
Python is a popular programming language created by Guido van Rossum.
Marie Curie won two Nobel Prizes in her lifetime.
The Amazon Rainforest is the largest tropical rainforest in the world.
Isaac Newton developed the theory of gravity.
The capital of Japan is Tokyo.
Mount Everest is the highest mountain in the world.
Elon Musk is the CEO of SpaceX.
Donal Trump is the president of America
